banner.heading: Finance Club Pro
banner.text: (Only Investment You Need to Master Your Investments)

syllabus.title: Ep1 - Building Foundation
syllabus.subtitle: Start with small money and make it big. From finding winning IPOs to handling penny stocks, this module covers everything you need to start investing practically.

syllabus.title: Ep2 - Advanced Fundamental Analysis
syllabus.subtitle: From management analysis to analysing numbers and finding fraud in companies, after this module, you become an expert who can analyse any company within 15 minutes.

syllabus.title: Ep3 - Strategic Options
syllabus.subtitle: Making money with options is a hard task, but not anymore. From all-time strategies to hedging, you learn every aspect of options

syllabus.title: Ep4 - Advanced Mutual Fund
syllabus.subtitle: This module helps you achieve your financial goals fast and securely by building a foundation and becoming a mutual fund advisor and distributor.
syllabus.alt: How to check Cash Flow Statement

candidate.courseTxt: Those who want to start their investment journey independently

faq.question: Is the course in Hindi or in English?
faq.answer: Course uses a primary language of Hindi but uses English as well in appropriate places

faq.question: Is it a pre-recorded course or live?
faq.answer: It is a pre-recorded course with access.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate of completion?
How to access this course after payment?
faq.answer: After payment you will get a login link and credential on your whatsapp number and mail. There you can access your course.

faq.question: Is this course focused on investors or traders?
faq.answer: This course is mainly focused on medium to long term investors.

faq.question: For what duration am I getting the course?
faq.answer: This course comes with lifetime access.

faq.question: Can I get a GST Invoice with this course?
faq.answer: Yes, you will get a GST invoice.

faq.question: Can I get a refund, if I don‚Äôt like the course?
faq.answer: Yes, you can opt for a full refund anytime within 5 days of purchase. To request a refund just write a mail to support@finnovationz.com

faq.question: Does this course include technical analysis (Charts and indicators)?
faq.answer: This course is designed for investors and not for traders, hence it doesn't need technical analysis.

faq.question: What skills are needed to start this course?
faq.answer: You just need to know maths till 5th grade with good observation skills.

clientTestimonial.name: Manohar Gupta

clientTestimonial.name: :Mohammad saddamhusen ansari

clientTestimonial.name: Nehal dalvi
